wikipedia_page.main: Janet Ann Lewis-Jones (12 May 1950 – 13 May 2017) was a member for Wales on the BBC Trust, the governing body of the British Broadcasting Corporation from 2006 to 2010. She was also formerly a vice president of the British Board of Film Classification and a board member at S4C.

response: * Janet Lewis-Jones – former National Trustee for Wales; retired after one term.
